    Such an enticing blend of rustic elegance, sophisticated simplicity, and artistic neutrality, our natural toned, coarse and thick woven ivory burlap ribbon is perfect to add that extra natural flair to your wreaths, flower arrangements, gifts wrappings, or favor decorations.

    Use this attractive braided 10 yards of burlap jute ribbon to festoon your craft creations entirely, imparting them a vintage charm, or wrap in a modest manner, creating a perfect contrastive elegance. Bring a perfect pastoral twist to your crafts and favors with our natural toned burlap woven ribbons. Revive the peaceful and serene countryside charm by adorning your party decorations and ambiance with our rustic jute braided ribbons.

    This rustic tone woven jute 1 inch burlap ribbon is perfect for unique and versatile craft projects, to dress window treatments, a table covers, or pillows, to craft charming bows for floral arrangements, garlands, and bouquets, or to accentuate the style of your favors, packaging, and hair accessories.

[Information]

Silky Smooth Satin Tablecloth

Silky, smooth, and shiny satin always inspires people; there is an overwhelming charm and sophistication that this imperial fabric exudes. This attribute makes it a number one choice for decoration, embellishing and ornamenting. Our supreme quality Satin Tablecloths are fashioned with sublime refinement and extra smoothness to create one of a kind table linen for those special events that call for an extra dash of swanky urbanity and a red carpet treatment.

Royal Look & Effect

Spread these shimmering sheets atop your drab tables and plain table tops to create a perfect celebratory mood that will leave your guests in a complete awe of such a festal decoration. Oozing royal feel and luster, our Satin Tablecloths are ideal to give your plain tables and tablescapes a quick glamorous twist. Elevate the elegance of your tables manifold at wedding, birthday, holiday dinner, Christmas feast, and special events  by draping with these lush spreads.

     

Premium Quality

Dress your tables to the nines with our durable, reusable and totally adorable Satin Tablecloths that will give your guests an instant esteemed feel and royal treatment during your event. Fashioned from premium quality silky satin, these tablecloths can be used again and again to spruce your tables up without losing their regal luster and seamless sheen.


Additional Information:

  • Quantity: 1 Tablecloth
  • Material: Satin
  • Color: Hunter Emerald Green
  • Size: 60"x126"
  • Thickness: 135 GSM
  • 1 Piece, Seamless Design
  • Hemmed edges for an exquisite look
  • Stain and Wrinkle resistant
  • How to Care: Machine washable with Cold water
  • For Tablecloth only, decorations not included
  • Uses: Wedding, Party, Event, Banquet, Decoration

Linen Care Instructions

Our crinkle taffeta tablecloths have an undeniable and unsurpassed charm that makes simple items look highly fashionable and modish.  Spread it atop your dreary tables or plain, lackluster table covers to achieve the excellence of class and vibrancy. The lovely crinkles accented all over the surface coupled with the impeccable metallic glint of lustrous taffeta will impart an imperial sublimity to your banquet or wedding tables.

Let this exquisite tablecloth enchant the entire ambiance of your special event with its seamless luster and upscale look. Combining the glistening luster of premium quality taffeta with the classy appeal of crinkle design, we present these elegant tablecloths to augment the beauty of your tables.

Create a perfect harmony of elegance and style by complementing these tablecloths with matching taffeta chair covers, table runners, table skirts, chair skirts, chair caps and sashes.
